mapper.select: SELECT e.*, CONCAT(b.room_name, '-', l.location, '-', b.postcode) AS roomName, l.location AS locationName FROM events e LEFT JOIN bookings b ON e.room = b.id LEFT JOIN location l ON e.location = l.id WHERE e.del = 1

SELECT e.*, CONCAT(b.room_name, '-', l.location, '-', b.postcode) AS roomName, l.location AS locationName, b.img AS img FROM events e LEFT JOIN bookings b ON e.room = b.id LEFT JOIN location l ON e.location = l.id WHERE e.id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO events(title, date, time, location, del, room, speaker, responsible, type, staff, company, contact, email, note, tag, cateringType, cateringCount, beverageType, dietaryRequirements, cateringServingTime) VALUES (#{title}, #{date}, #{time}, #{location}, 1, #{room}, #{speaker}, #{responsible}, #{type}, #{staff}, #{company}, #{contact}, #{email}, #{note}, #{tag}, #{cateringType}, #{cateringCount}, #{beverageType}, #{dietaryRequirements}, #{cateringServingTime})
mapper.update: UPDATE events SET del = 0 WHERE id = #{id}

UPDATE events SET title = #{title}, date = #{date}, time = #{time}, location = #{location}, room = #{room}, type = #{type}, speaker = #{speaker}, tag = #{tag}, responsible = #{responsible}, staff = #{staff}, company = #{company}, contact = #{contact}, email = #{email}, note = #{note} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT CONCAT(b.room_name, ' ', l.location, ' ', b.postcode) AS fullAddress FROM events e JOIN bookings b ON e.room = b.id JOIN location l ON b.location = l.id WHERE e.id = #{eventId}
